name: Dead Man's Hand
description:
Dead Man's Hand is an action-shooter game developed by Human Head Studios. It came out on 26-03-2004. Atari published the game. Dead Man's Hand has a Metascore of 63, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Dead Man's Hand on PC and Xbox.
It was produced by Bruno Bonnell, Constantine Hantzopoulos, Kyle Peschel and Michael Ryan. Michael Larson and Rom Di Prisco scored the game.
